summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4437 for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Hanford Street to Bronson Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of sewers, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52357, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
